qas.question: According to 2015 data, how many how many visitors gave London its ranking as the number one visited city in the world?
How many US dollars are estimated to have been spent in London by visitors from other countries?
As of 2003, roughly how many full time workers were employed in the tourism industry?
Which travel and tourism website's user activity has indicated that London is the number one travel destination?
What percentage of visitor money is estimated to be spent in London?

context: London is one of the leading tourist destinations in the world and in 2015 was ranked as the most visited city in the world with over <a0_0>65 million<a0_0/> visits. It is also the top city in the world by visitor cross-border spending, estimated at US<a1_0>$20.23 billion<a1_0/> in 2015 Tourism is one of London's prime industries, employing the equivalent of <a2_0>350,000<a2_0/> full-time workers in 2003, and the city accounts for <a4_0>54%<a4_0/> of all inbound visitor spend in UK. As of 2016 London is rated as the world top ranked city destination by <a3_0>TripAdvisor<a3_0/> users.
